name: Murder, She Wrote 2: Return to Cabot Cove
name_original: Murder, She Wrote 2: Return to Cabot Cove
description:
Murder, She Wrote 2: Return to Cabot Cove is a game developed by Legacy Interactive.
You can play Murder, She Wrote 2: Return to Cabot Cove on PC, Classic Macintosh, iOS and Android.
